meanings.sent1: The disused toy lay forgotten in the corner of the room.
meanings.sent2: The disused car was sold to a junkyard.
meanings.sent3: The disused swing set in the park looked sad and lonely.
meanings.sent4: Her disused dreams gathered dust in the attic of her mind.
meanings.sent5: The disused well whispered stories of the past.

meanings.sent1: The disused building was covered in overgrown vines.
meanings.sent2: The disused house was a haunting reminder of better days.
meanings.sent3: The disused garden was a jungle of weeds and wildflowers.
meanings.sent4: His disused bicycle leaned against the fence, rusted and forgotten.
meanings.sent5: The disused path led into the heart of the mysterious forest.
